Metadata.Title: Encrypt the Data Or Secure the Communication Channel
Metadata.DirectLink: Encrypt the Data Or Secure the Communication Channel

Content.Data:
Description

If you are sending sensitive data over the network to the client, encrypt the data or secure the channel. A common practice is to use SSL between the client and Web server. Between servers, an increasingly common approach is to use IPSec. To secure sensitive data that flows through several intermediaries, such as Web service Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) messages, use message level encryption.
